title: The Name Server Mystery
description: A threat actor is using the domain 'https://tryhackme.com/'. Use an online DNS lookup tool to find the AMERICAN MX (Mail Exchange) record for this domain. The flag is the mail server name (without the domain part).
hints: Search for 'DNS lookup tool' or 'MX record lookup'.
Look for the MX record and extract just the part before the first dot.
